title: About
text:
I am currently a Lecturer in the Department of Statistics at the University of California, Berkeley, having been in the role since June 2022.

Courses Taught

Data C8 (Foundations of Data Science)
Stat 20 (Introduction to Probability and Statistics)
Stat 134 (Concepts of Probability)
Stat C131A (Statistical Methods for Data Science)



Education

MA Statistics, University of California, Berkeley, 2022
BS Statistics, University of Florida, 2021
